sections.title: Champion of the Enlightened (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Champion of the Enlightened class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: The champion of the enlightened gains no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Detect Chaos (Sp) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Functions like a paladin's detect evil ability but detects chaotic alignment instead of evil alignment.

sections.title: Martial Artist ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Champion of the enlightened class levels stack with monk levels for AC bonus, flurry of blows, stunning fist, and unarmed strike features.

sections.title: Smite Chaos (Su) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Grants additional smite evil uses and allows using smite against chaotic creatures, dealing extra damage to chaotic outsiders, aberrations, and fey.

sections.title: Ki Pool (Su) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Gains a ki pool based on class level and Wisdom modifier, can spend 2 ki points to trigger lay on hands or smite abilities.

sections.title: Pursuit of [Knowledge](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/skills/knowledge) ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Adds half class level to all Knowledge checks and allows making Knowledge skill checks untrained.

sections.title: Sweeping Smite ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Allows making additional unarmed strikes against adjacent evil or chaotic creatures when using smite abilities, functioning like Cleave.

sections.title: Valiant Stand (Su) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Gains sacred bonuses to attack rolls and AC when adjacent to multiple opponents but no allies.

sections.title: Shield the Weak (Su) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: As an immediate action, can provide improved cover and improved evasion to adjacent allies against area effects by forgoing own saving throw.

sections.title: Skill Mastery (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Functions exactly like the rogue's skill mastery advanced talent, allowing taking 10 on certain skills even under stress.

sections.title: Perfect Opening ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Can make an attack of opportunity when an enemy confirms a critical hit, even if incapacitated, and the attack is automatically a critical threat.

sections.title: One Finger (Su) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Can resolve a single unarmed attack as a melee touch attack as a standard action.

sections.title: Perfect Strike (Su) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Can spend 1 ki point as a swift action to roll attack and damage twice for the next unarmed attack, choosing the better result.

sections.title: Whirlwind Smite ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Champion of the Enlightened)
sections.description: Can make unarmed strikes against all threatened creatures as a full-round action while applying smite benefits, like Whirlwind Attack.
